page.title: 12Housing Survey of area
page.content: To find out about the other type of houses in the surrounding area covered by the grid reference I.E New Hedges; part of the Glebe :part of Narberth R.D,we compioled a questionnaire and children who lived in that area provided us with this information about the houses. Type of Home Bungalow House Cottage _____________ 12 18 2 Do you own the property? Yes No ________________________ 30 2 How long have you lived in that house _____________________________________ Under 5 Years 5_10years 10_15years 14 12 6 Age of building_ 0_5yrs 5_10yrs10_15 _______________ 2 1 2 Size of property Over 15 ________________ 27 Large Medium Small 7 24 1
